name: Battle Anthem (Tier 4)
description: Charged skills deal +15% damage; increases Endurance cost by 10%.
notes: Tier 4: Increases Charged Skills' damage against all enemies (including players with less than 60% Endurance) by 15% and increases their Endurance cost by 10%. (Endurance cost is not modeled in this calculator.)

name: Battle Anthem (Tier 6)
description: On Charged Skill damage: conditional bonus damage (player/boss) up to 10%.
notes: Tier 6: When dealing damage with a Charged Skill, if the target is a player, increases the damage by 1% for every 10 Endurance difference between you and the target, up to 10%; if the target is a boss, deals bonus damage based on the Endurance you have consumed: 1% bonus damage for every 10 Endurance consumed, up to 10%.

name: Morale Chant (Tier 0)
description: Yi River stacks: increases damage/healing (modeled as damage only).
notes: In-game: 1% dmg/heal per stack, up to 5 stacks for 12s. This calculator models only damage.

name: Morale Chant (Tier 1)
description: Yi River stacks: +Physical Penetration and +damage/healing (modeled as damage only).
notes: In-game: +2 Physical Penetration and +1% dmg/heal per stack, up to 5 stacks (max 10 pen, 5% dmg).

name: Morale Chant (Tier 3)
description: When target is controlled: doubles Yi River effects (modeled as boss-friendly max 10% dmg and 20 pen).
notes: In-game: when target is controlled, doubles Yi River's effect (+2% dmg/heal and +4 pen per stack) and stacks gained. With 5 stacks: max 10% dmg and 20 pen. Default effect approximated as 60%: 10% → 6%, 20 → 12.

name: Morale Chant (Tier 5)
description: Adds +4.6% Critical Rate (modeled with the same default-effect factor).

name: Blossom Barrage (Tier 1)
description: Increases the ballistic skill DMG Bonus from Combo effect to 20%.
notes: In-game: applies when target has your Combo effect. This calculator approximates it as an unconditional +20% Projectile Skill Damage Boost for Silkbind (Umbrella) ballistic skills.

name: Blossom Barrage (Tier 4)
description: In non-Arena modes, when Spring Away hits a target with Combo effect from you: damage +10%; max targets 3→5.
notes: In-game: conditional on Combo effect and non-Arena; also increases max targets. This calculator models only the +10% damage portion (applied to the Spring Away skill) and does not model max-target changes.

name: Stone Fortitude
description: Increases Stonesplit defense and damage by 10%

name: Star Reacher
description: Gain 5% Physical Attack bonus for up to 8s after applying Lingering Bone Mark (boss-usable).
notes: In-game: triggers when applying Lingering Bone Mark; once per second and refreshes duration; knocking Airborne increases the bonus to 10%. Since Airborne is typically not applicable to bosses, this calculator models only the boss-usable baseline as an unconditional +5% Physical ATK Multiplier when enabled, and does not model buff uptime/refresh mechanics.

name: Mountain's Might (Tier 4)
description: While Long Wind is active: +1.5% Affinity Rate; +1.5% against boss targets.
notes: In-game: the +1.5% damage applies only vs bosses and only while Long Wind is active. This calculator approximates it as +1.5% Damage Boost (unconditional).

name: Sword Morph (Tier 3)
description: After sword energy hits a target: sword energy deals more damage (stacks).
notes: In-game: for 5s after sword energy hits a target, sword energy deals +5% damage to that target; consecutive hits stack up to +15%. If the target is a non-player unit and Exhausted, each stack becomes +8% (up to +24% at 3 stacks). This calculator approximates the max normal stack as +15% Damage Boost (unconditional).

name: Echoes of Oblivion
description: Infernal Twinblades' Light Attacks ignore 10% Physical Defense and 10 Bamboocut Resistance. Gain Samsara and increase HP damage dealt by 5%
notes: Normal Light Attacks apply Sin debuff; Flamelash Light Attacks apply Karma debuff. Attacking targets with both Sin and Karma grants additional bonuses. Dealing 6 instances of damage within 2 seconds resets Delusion cooldown (once every 10s).
